mapper.insert: insert into works(work_id, author_id, exhibition_id, gallery_id, work_title, work_description, work_year, work_image, work_size) values(seq_work.NEXTVAL, #{author_id}, #{exhibition_id}, #{gallery_id}, #{work_title}, #{work_description}, #{work_year}, #{work_image}, #{work_size})
mapper.update: UPDATE works SET work_valid = 0 WHERE work_title = #{work_title}

update works set author_id = #{author_id}, exhibition_id = #{exhibition_id}, gallery_id = #{gallery_id}, work_title = #{work_title}, work_description = #{work_description}, work_year = #{work_year}, work_image = #{work_image}, work_size = #{work_size} where work_id = #{work_id}
